Package kueres.base

Class BaseController<E extends BaseEntity<E>,​R extends BaseRepository<E>,​S extends BaseService<E,​R>>

java.lang.Object
kueres.base.BaseController<E,​R,​S>
Direct Known Subclasses:
EventController
public abstract class BaseController<E extends BaseEntity<E>,​R extends BaseRepository<E>,​S extends BaseService<E,​R>>
extends java.lang.Object
The BaseController provides basic CRUD functionality for a BaseEntity. To operate correctly it needs a BaseEntity and its BaseRepository and BaseService.
Since:
Feb 22, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tim Engbrocks, tim.engbrocks@student.kit.edu

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      @GetMapping @RolesAllowed({"administrator","helper"}) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<E> findAll​(@RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> filter, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> sort, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> page, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> size)
      Find all entities of the controllers BaseEntity-type. The result can filtered, sorted and paged.

      See kueres.query.SearchCriteria for filter syntax.

      See kueres.query.SortBuilder for sort syntax.

      Parameters:
      filter - - the filter options.
      sort - - the sort options.
      page - - the number of the page used for pagination.
      size - - the size of the page used for pagination.
      Returns:
      The result as a page.

    • findById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") @RolesAllowed({"administrator","helper"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<E> findById​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long id)
      Find an entity of the controllers BaseEntity-type by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - - the entity's identifier.
      Returns:
      The entity with the given identifier.

    • create

      @PostMapping @RolesAllowed("administrator") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<E> create​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws java.lang.InstantiationException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.lang.SecurityException, java.io.IOException
      Create an entity of the controllers BaseEntity-type.
      Parameters:
      request - - the HTTP request received by the servlet
      response - - the HTTP response object for the servlet
      Returns:
      The created entity. This contains the entity's identifier.
      Throws:
      java.lang.SecurityException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.InstantiationException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.io.IOException - if the JSON string can not be processed

    • update

      @PutMapping("/{id}") @RolesAllowed("administrator") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<E> update​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long id, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InstantiationException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.lang.SecurityException
      Update an entity of the controllers BaseEntity-type by its identifier. Fields that are not populated in the updated data will not be changed.
      Parameters:
      id - - the identifier of the entity that should be updated.
      request - - the HTTP request received by the servlet
      response - - the HTTP response object for the servlet
      Returns:
      The updated entity.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.SecurityException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.InstantiationException - if the JSON string can not be processed

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @RolesAllowed("administrator") public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Boolean> delete​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long id)
      Delete an entity of the controllers BaseEntity-type by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - - the identifier of the entity that should be deleted.
      Returns:
      The entity that was deleted.
